ygData.subject: Lvl 7 Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: I switched servers to Rodcet Nife recently, and am having trouble finding groups.  Before on Vallen it was no trouble finding people to group with, but
ygData.messageBody:
I switched servers to Rodcet Nife recently, and am having trouble finding
groups. Before on Vallen it was no trouble finding people to group with,
but everyone seems distant on here. I only switched to play with my Bro in
law, he is gonna help me when he makes his way to Halas. But I need to get
up past 7 to get to him. Any suggestions? I played a lvl 14 shaman before,
and never had trouble getting into a group, but things seem so different on
here. Only people lvl 3-4 wanna group, and they die to quick in BB.....

Any help appreciated, thanks!
